nodes.text: Wurtz was a male individual who served in the Republic Navy as an admiral during the Clone Wars. Around 22 BBY, Jedi Master Mace Windu tried to contact Wurtz from the Jedi Temple to ask for three of the admiral's cruisers.
Wurtz was first mentioned in the 2008 Star Wars: The Clone Wars film, and the spelling of his name was revealed in the subtitles for the DVD version.
